hypothesis_content.title: Dominance Compression Before Major Altcoin Rally
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC dominance trades in a <1.5% range for 7+ days during NEUTRAL/BULL regime, followed by breakout below range with increasing altcoin volume, it signals start of sustained altseason.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended compression indicates equilibrium between BTC and altcoin flows. Break with volume suggests institutional rotation. Current news mentions 'altseason' speculation aligns with this setup.
entry_conditions: Break below compression range with >20% increase in top 10 altcoin volume
Cumulative altcoin funding rates turn positive

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC dominance drops to 55% (major support break)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance reclaims compression range high + 0.5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakdown fails and dominance returns to compression range, indicating false breakout and continued BTC leadership.
